# Everforest colors for less pager
# Generated from template - do not edit manually
# Source this in your shell configuration

# Less termcap colors
export LESS_TERMCAP_mb=$'\e[1;{{ansi_red}}m'     # Begin blinking
export LESS_TERMCAP_md=$'\e[1;{{ansi_blue}}m'    # Begin bold
export LESS_TERMCAP_me=$'\e[0m'                  # End mode
export LESS_TERMCAP_se=$'\e[0m'                  # End standout-mode
export LESS_TERMCAP_so=$'\e[{{ansi_yellow}};{{ansi_black}}m'  # Begin standout-mode
export LESS_TERMCAP_ue=$'\e[0m'                  # End underline
export LESS_TERMCAP_us=$'\e[4;{{ansi_green}}m'   # Begin underline
